title: 【輪到西班牙領導人親自感染了。中國呢？】平等大臣Irene Montero中招副首相隔離內閣全體驗毒
contents:
https://www.bbc.com/news/live/world-us-canada-51847128?ns_mchannel=social&ns_source=twitter&ns_campaign=bbc_live&ns_linkname=5e6a1003c429ed066b592214%26Entire%20Spanish%20government%20to%20undergo%20virus%20tests%262020-03-12T11%3A00%3A00.558Z&ns_fee=0&pinned_post_locator=urn:asset:48bc4944-1175-4eca-b318-51f689582393&pinned_post_asset_id=5e6a1003c429ed066b592214&pinned_post_type=share

The entire Spanish government are having tests for Covid-19 after Spain's equality minister Irene Montero tested positive for the new coronavirus, officials have announced.

She and her partner, deputy prime minister and Podemos leader Pablo Iglesias, have been placed in quarantine, the statement added.

"This morning, all members of the government will undergo testing," it said. The results of the tests are expected to be released later on Thursday.
